statements: SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action, timestamp, description FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_trails;
SELECT AVG(audit_id) as avg_audit_id FROM audit_trails WHERE action LIKE '%delete%';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT audit_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-15' AND timestamp <= '2021-02-15' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND action = 'login' ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp < '2021-03-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_description, audit_type FROM audit_trails;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigation_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT investigation_id, investigation_start_date FROM investigations ORDER BY investigation_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT audit_id, audit_type, audit_date, audit_description FROM audit_trails;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigation_id < 10;
SELECT audit_type, audit_date, audit_description FROM audit_trails WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE audit_type = 'Data Entry' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT investigation_start_date, investigation_end_date, investigation_type FROM investigations WHERE investigation_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY investigation_start_date DESC;
SELECT id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trail;
SELECT * FROM examination WHERE agency='FBI';
SELECT examiner_name, agency, end_date FROM examination ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT investigator_name, case_type FROM investigation WHERE status='closed';
SELECT * FROM examination WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT examiner_name, agency, start_date FROM examination WHERE agency = 'FBI';
SELECT investigator_name, case_type, status FROM investigation WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM examination ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE id = 10;
SELECT examiner_id, date_of_exam FROM examinations WHERE exam_id = 5;
SELECT investigator_id, findings FROM investigations WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'staff' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM examinations WHERE examiner_id = 100 ORDER BY date_of_exam DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT investigator_id, date_of_investigation, findings FROM investigations WHERE findings ILIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM audit_trail;
SELECT DISTINCT action_type FROM audit_trail;
SELECT audit_id, action_timestamp, details FROM audit_trail ORDER BY audit_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM examination WHERE examination_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM examination WHERE examination_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT audit_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_date FROM investigation WHERE outcome = 'Pending' ORDER BY investigation_date ASC;
SELECT regulator_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM regulatory_body WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, message FROM audit_log WHERE audit_id = 201 AND log_timestamp >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp;
